name: Space Mission
description: Your mission is to go into space, survive an asteroid field before blasting alien ships, if you allow any ships to escape then it is game over. Space Mission is a single screen shooter and your ship stays static in the middle of the screen but can turn in a 360 degree direction. As well as turn, your ship can also move forward in short bursts. Your ship can take so many hits from asteroids or alien ships bullets and your damage status is told to you as it gets worse. Before you start the game you have a choice of seven skill levels from easy to suicidal.
